text: Euphorbia trichophylla is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical high-altitude grassland and rocky areas. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Madagascar trichophylla Category:Plants described in 1883 Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by John Gilbert Baker
title: Euphorbia trichophylla
